name: Java 8
description: Version 8 of the Java programming language
reasons: Java 8 is currently not supported in a released version of Weblogic

name: Java 6
description: Version 6 of the Java programming language
reasons: Java 6 is currently the bank standard

name: JEE 7.0
description: Version 7 of the Java Enterprise Edition specification
reasons: JEE 7 is currently will only be supported in Weblogic 13c

name: JSF 1.2
description: Version 1.2 of the Java Server Faces specification

name: Oracle ADF 11.1.2.3
description: Version X.X of the Oracle ADF framework
reasons: ADF is currently the Bank standard

name: Java 7
description: Version 7 of the Java programming language
reasons: Java 7 is currently supported by Weblogic 12c, however care should be taken especially when using third party components such as Webcentre
